column1: Smoque BBQ////Does this place need more reviews to prove they got good bbq? No
column2: but I'm gonna say i was really pleased with my meal there and hope the owners are delighted with yet another good review. I had the rib combo with the mac and cheese
column5: with a friend). It was all tasty and even though it was so far away from where I live and Â it was rainy like crazy going back home
column6: I was full and happy with my meal that I didn't even care. I did also have a food coma afterwards.
